== Main inclusion report for Bluez-pin ==

Author: Charles Majola

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/b/bluez-pin/

2. ''Rationale:'' Depends for Bluez-libs 

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.

4. ''QA:''
* Bluez-utils pin helper, small gtk GUI
* Bugs: There are no major bugs in Ubuntu or Debian
** No autstanding bugs in upstream BTS
** Responsive and good upstream.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.
